overview: Steven Scarborough's infamous Skuff series returns with brute force and sexual energy so exciting it can only be described as Downright Fierce! In keeping with the Skuff traditions of over-the-top sets and fetish action that pushes the envelope, Skuff 4 will leave you drenched after watching an adult video first: an indoor scene with rain! Newcomer Hot House Exclusive Paul Wagner makes his debut with fellow Exclusives Ross Hurston, Ethan Wolfe, Kyle King, Johnny Gunn, & Vince Ferelli. Josh West, Andrew Justice, Race Cooper, Derrek Diamond and Luke and Brendan Davies round out the cast making this one of our all-time hottest extreme leather/fetish group of players ever
title: Skuff 4: Downright Fierce
